services.name: AC Repair
services.shortDescription: Fast, reliable air conditioning repair for all makes and models. Same-day service available across San Antonio.
services.longDescription:
When your AC goes out in a San Antonio summer, every minute counts. Cool Right AC & Heating provides fast, dependable air conditioning repair for all major brands including Trane, Carrier, Lennox, Goodman, and Rheem. Our NATE-certified technicians diagnose the problem quickly and give you an honest, upfront quote before any work begins.

Common issues we fix include refrigerant leaks, compressor failures, frozen evaporator coils, faulty capacitors, and thermostat malfunctions. We stock common parts on our trucks so most repairs are completed in a single visit. No overtime charges on evenings or weekends — because AC emergencies don't follow a schedule.

Every repair is backed by our parts and labor warranty. We'll also inspect your full system and let you know if there are any issues that could cause problems down the road — no pressure, just honest advice.

services.name: AC Installation
services.shortDescription: Professional air conditioning installation with top-rated brands. Free in-home estimates and financing available.
services.longDescription:
Whether you're replacing an aging unit or installing AC in a new construction, Cool Right delivers expert air conditioning installation sized and configured for San Antonio's extreme heat. We carry high-efficiency systems from Trane, Carrier, and Goodman that are built to handle 100-degree Texas summers without driving your electric bill through the roof.

Every installation starts with a thorough load calculation to make sure your new system is properly sized for your home. An oversized unit short-cycles and wastes energy. An undersized unit runs nonstop and can't keep up. We get it right.

Our installation crews are factory-trained and follow manufacturer specifications to the letter — which protects your warranty and ensures peak performance from day one. We also offer flexible financing options so you can get the comfort you need without the financial stress.

services.name: Heating Repair
services.shortDescription: Furnace and heat pump repair to keep your family warm through San Antonio's cold snaps.
services.longDescription:
San Antonio winters may be mild by northern standards, but when a cold front drops temperatures into the 20s and 30s, a working heater is essential. Cool Right AC & Heating repairs all types of heating systems including gas furnaces, electric furnaces, heat pumps, and dual-fuel systems.

Common heating issues we resolve include pilot light and ignition problems, blower motor failures, cracked heat exchangers, thermostat malfunctions, and heat pumps stuck in cooling mode. Our technicians carry diagnostic equipment to pinpoint issues quickly and common replacement parts to complete most repairs the same day.

Safety is our top priority with heating repairs. We perform carbon monoxide testing on every gas furnace repair and will alert you immediately if we detect any safety concerns. Your family's comfort and safety come first.

services.name: Furnace Installation
services.shortDescription: New furnace and heating system installation with expert sizing and professional setup.
services.longDescription:
When repair costs start adding up or your furnace is past its 15-year lifespan, a new installation makes financial sense. Cool Right installs high-efficiency gas furnaces, electric furnaces, and heat pump systems designed for the San Antonio climate.

San Antonio's mild winters mean a heat pump is often the most efficient choice — providing both heating and cooling from a single system. For homes with existing gas lines, a high-efficiency gas furnace paired with your AC can be the most cost-effective option. We'll walk you through the pros and cons of each so you can make an informed decision.

Every installation includes removal and disposal of your old equipment, new thermostat setup, and a post-installation inspection to verify everything is running at peak efficiency. We handle all city permits and inspections.
features: Heat pump and gas furnace options

services.name: Duct Cleaning
services.shortDescription: Professional air duct cleaning to improve indoor air quality and system efficiency in your San Antonio home.
services.longDescription:
San Antonio's dusty climate, oak pollen, and cedar fever season mean your air ducts collect contaminants faster than you might think. Over time, dust, pet dander, mold spores, and allergens build up in your ductwork and circulate through your home every time the system runs.

Cool Right uses professional-grade HEPA-filtered vacuum equipment and rotary brush systems to thoroughly clean your entire duct system — supply lines, return lines, and registers. We also inspect for duct leaks, disconnected sections, and insulation damage that could be costing you money.

Most San Antonio homes benefit from duct cleaning every 3-5 years, or sooner if you have pets, allergies, or have recently completed a renovation. Our technicians will show you before-and-after photos so you can see the difference.

services.name: Maintenance Plans
services.shortDescription: Preventive HVAC maintenance plans that catch problems early and keep your system running efficiently.
services.longDescription:
The best way to avoid expensive breakdowns — especially during a San Antonio July — is regular preventive maintenance. Cool Right's maintenance plans include two visits per year: one before summer to tune up your AC and one before winter to check your heating system.

During each visit, our technicians perform a comprehensive inspection: checking refrigerant levels, cleaning coils, testing electrical connections, lubricating moving parts, inspecting the condensate drain, and verifying thermostat calibration. We catch small problems before they turn into big repair bills.

Maintenance plan members also receive priority scheduling during peak season (no more waiting days for service when everyone's AC breaks down at once), discounts on repairs and parts, and no overtime charges. It's the smartest investment you can make in your HVAC system.

services.name: Emergency HVAC Service
services.shortDescription: 24/7 emergency HVAC repair when you need it most. No overtime charges for Cool Right customers.
services.longDescription:
AC failures in San Antonio don't wait for business hours. When your system goes down at midnight during a heat wave or your furnace stops working during a winter cold front, Cool Right's emergency team is ready.

Our emergency technicians are dispatched with fully stocked trucks so we can resolve most issues on the spot — no waiting for parts to be ordered. We handle everything from compressor failures and refrigerant leaks to electrical issues and complete system shutdowns.

We understand that an HVAC emergency is stressful. That's why we provide clear communication from the moment you call: estimated arrival time, upfront diagnosis, and honest pricing before we start any work. Maintenance plan members receive priority emergency response and no overtime surcharges.
features: Rapid response times across San Antonio
No overtime charges for plan members

services.name: Thermostat Installation
services.shortDescription: Smart thermostat installation and programming to maximize comfort and cut energy costs.
services.longDescription:
Upgrading to a smart thermostat is one of the easiest ways to cut your energy bills and improve comfort in your San Antonio home. Cool Right installs and configures all major smart thermostat brands including Nest, Ecobee, Honeywell Home, and Emerson Sensi.

A properly installed and programmed smart thermostat can save you 10-15% on heating and cooling costs by learning your schedule, adjusting for San Antonio's temperature swings, and allowing remote control from your phone. Our technicians ensure compatibility with your existing HVAC system, handle all wiring, and walk you through setup and programming before we leave.

We also offer basic thermostat upgrades for homes that don't need smart features. Whether you want Wi-Fi control or just a reliable programmable thermostat, we'll help you choose the right option for your home and budget.
